Amber
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Amber installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Amber, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Amber/22.4-foss-2022a-AmberTools-22.5-CUDA-11.7.0
```
